articles.author: Shubhajit Roy
articles.title: ‘Bloc-based division’ in Indo-Pacific as dangerous as NATO’s eastward expansion in Europe: Top Chinese official Le Yucheng - The Indian Express
articles.description: “The Ukraine crisis provides a mirror for us to observe the situation in the Asia-Pacific. We cannot but ask, how can we prevent a crisis like this from happening in the Asia-Pacific?” Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Le Yucheng said on Saturday.
articles.content: In a clear reference to groupings like the Quad, a top Chinese foreign ministry official has drawn parallels between the NATO strategy of eastward expansion in Europe and the creation of small blocs … [+3374 chars]

articles.title: BIGBANG announces April release date for comeback single and music video - Lifestyle Asia Hong Kong
articles.description: BIGBANG and YG Entertainment have announced that the Korean boy band will make its long-awaited comeback this April. Here's what we know.
articles.content:
BIGBANG and YG Entertainment’s official accounts have announced that the band will make its long-awaited comeback on 5 April, 2022. 
BIGBANG will return  and soon. Over the weekend, the social media… [+2698 chars]

articles.title: China attack, Russian war spillover belittled - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: CHINA is unlikely to attack the Philippines over their sea distpue, political analysts said at the weekend, while downplaying the potential of Russia’s war against Ukraine reaching Asia.
articles.content:
By Alyssa Nicole O. Tan, Reporter

articles.title: PH still at 'very low risk' for Covid-19 amid rise in infections in other Asian countries — OCTA - Manila Bulletin
articles.content:
The Philippines remained under very low risk classification for Covid-19 despite the surge in cases in neighboring countries, the independent research group OCTA said on Sunday, March 20.

articles.title: 50-year-old man dies after collapsing during Singapore Athletics' 5km walk event - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A 50-year-old man has died after he collapsed during a 5,000m walk event at Singapore Athletics' (SA) All Comers Meet 2 on Saturday morning (March 19). The Straits Times understands he dropped to the ground within the first kilometre of his event,…
